body: P.S.: Try this as an expirement. Increase the refinement of your mesh, factor of 4 should be nice. You can simply reduce the the blockMesh cell size by 4 to accomplish that. Try running the case and see the impact on the residual graph.  1) how have you defined 4 as a "nice" factor? 2) here below (sorry for the quality..) the residual graph with the blockMesh cell sized reduced by this factor: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3QCA0XbBBMwTLBGnYvNddmnuko8uulwSzoMr61eW8vxWG95ok49QSC9737W7HtEAhL9fYRivzaUuw-JEwK*74fkUwo5bvYbw/2.jpg)
